modName: Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation SeveNbase Conversion
summary: Brokefoot\'s UNP Mashup Compilation for SeveNBase Bombshell body with working weightslider.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FF4080]Install [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]Brokefoot\'s UNP Mashup Compilation[/url] first then overwrite the files![/color][/b]

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Description[/size][/color][/b]

This is an conversion of Brokefoot\'s UNP Mashup Compilation for SeveNBase Bombshell body,while the mashup compilation was already working with this body mod, there were however major clipping issues,I have fixed most of them altrough there will still be small clipping issues when moving(mainly around the boobs) or when using different animations, I can live with that,they are not noticeable unless you look for them.

I am by no means expert in conversions, I did this because I like this body and the armor mashup!

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Installation:[/size][/color][/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager,easy and fast.

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Known Bugs/Issues:[/size][/color][/b]

- Fur cloak does not have breast physics, will be fixed in an future update.
- Some small clipping around the boobs area.

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Requirements:[/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22166]Brokefoot\'s UNP Mashup Compilation[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992]SeveNBase costum body replacer[/url] , Bombshell body only!

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Questions & Answers:[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#008000]Q:[/color] Why there is no Temptress Dress?
A: It will come later.

[color=#008000]Q:[/color] Will this be converted to the Original/Natural body type?
A: Yes, when? I dont know.

[color=#008000]Q:[/color] I\'ve spotted an issue!
A: Report it by PM\'ing me,that way I will see it faster rather than comments.

[b][color=#FF8000][size=150]Credits[/size][/color][/b]

Brokefoot for this awesome mashup compilation!

*Special thanks to Ghostifish for optimizing the Scrap Plates and Skirt meshes.
